column43: Dr. Sumanth M. Shetty completed his post graduation in masters of dental surgery[ mds] in the field of Pedodontics and preventive dentistry, from the esteemed Bapuji Dental College, Davangere, a Karnataka, India. He is now serving as professor and HOD in the department of pediatric dentistry. He is also a practicing implantology having completed his implant course from the prestigious Nobel Biocare, Sweden. his keen interest in the field of implant dentistry has led him to accrue further certifications in this field. He is also certified in complicated sinus lift implant procedures and advanced full mouth rehabilitation from Ossteum, Lisbon and Jakarta respectively. At chisel dental clinic we are proud of our unique brand of gentle family dentistry. By explaining your treatment choices every step of the way we help you make an informed decision. We treat you with honesty, compassion, and respect.

column6: Implantologist, Dentist, Cosmetic/Aesthetic Dentist, Prosthodontist, Dental Surgeon
column43: Dr Baswaraj Biradar had done BDS, MDS (prosthodontics and Implantology)Dr Baswaraj, graduated as the Best outgoing student of the year 1998, during his Bachelors at M S Ramaiah Dental College. He secured 20th Rank in the Karnataka state entrance examination. Subsequently, pursued his Masters from premier institute, A B Shetty Memorial Institute of Dental Sciences in the department of Prosthodontics and Implantology. He has 13 years of experience as a dental teaching Faculty. He held various positions as a Professor, Postgraduate guide and head of the prosthodontics department in various institutions such as MS Ramaiah Dental college, Vydehi Dental College, Oxford Dental college, Subbaiah institute of Dental Sciences. Dr Baswaraj Biradar is practicing General dentistry, Prosthodontics and Implantotology since 25 years. Having earned his MDS degree, he is equipped with the latest education, training, and technology to provide the highest quality care. Most importantly, he will ensure you understand the treatment you need, helping you feel relaxed and confident. During his free time, you can find him playing badminton and cricket.

column2: 152/A & B, 39th Cross, 9th Block
column43: Dr. Arati Talikoti graduated from KLE Institute of Dental Sciences, Belgaum and completed her post graduation in prosthodontics & implantology at M S Ramaiah Dental College in the year 2008, Bangalore through Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences.With their backgrounds of profound clinical experience and passion in teaching and research, Dr. Shambhu and Dr. Arati works together at Infinit Dental Solutions to deliver the highest possible standards of dentistry and personalized dental care services to their patients. Their mission is to reconstruct a charming smile in recognition of each patient’s individuality and uniqueness.

column2: 336,First Floor, 27th  Main Road.
column6: Oral And MaxilloFacial Surgeon, Implantologist, Dental Surgeon, Dentist
column43: Dr. Aditi Garg , is an gold medalist from Rajasthan University in 2007. She has worked in Ahmedabad Municipal Dental college for 5 years in Dept of Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery where they did a lot of Dental implants and wisdom teeth removal along with other surgeries. Inspired from the work there , She did Masters in Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery from Rajiv Gandhi University, Bangalore with Distinction in 2014. During her masters ,She has worked with the best surgeons in the country at Mahaveer Jain hospital managing oral swellings, oral lesions , cysts, aesthetic procedures like jaw repositioning, genioplasty (orthognathic surgeries), rhinoplasty, Dental implants, fillers for facial rehabilitation.She has experience with private hospitals and multiple Dental clinics where she go as a consultant surgeon for Dental implants , oral surgeries and facial injectables like fillers, botox and threads.She has a decade long experience in Dental Implants which she has learnt from reputed Dharwad Dental College in 2010. To gain more experience in facial esthetics, She have done training with Ailesbury Hair clinic, London in Hair transplant surgeries and have been doing hair transplant surgeries for Richfeel cosmos . Here along with Hair transplant surgeries, Hair prp and hair systems are used to restore the lost hair on patients scalp. She has also been trained for non surgical facial esthetics like microneedling, chemical peels, anti-ageing techniques like botox, face prp, fillers, facial thread, medical facials, lasers .She is the founder and Chief Doctor at Elite Esthetics & Dental Clinic in Hsr layout, Bangalore , an integrated center which brings together services for Hair, Face and Dental procedure to give a holistic treatment . With her exposure, she gets the experienced consultants in the clinic, and the best materials to provide all the services at one center so that patients do not have to go at multiple places. She can holistically treat a patient who requires any treatment on the face as she have experience in how to combine the dental and facial procedures to give a comprehensive treatment. In her career spanning 17 years she has treated more than 5000 patients and her patients always go back smiling !

column2: 884, 19th Main, 39th Cross, Jayanagar 4th T Block
column43: A passionate dental surgeon with 14 years of clinical work experience dedicated to crafting beautiful smiles. Dr. Sindhu S Kumar is the founder of Excel Dental Care, Jayanagar, Bangalore, and is committed to providing the best dental care. She completed her Bachelor’s in Dental Surgery from JSS Dental College and Hospital, Mysore in 2009. She is a member of the Indian Dental Association. She has done a number of diploma certificate courses in rotary endodontics and cosmetic dentistry. Services provided by Dr. Sindhu are root canal treatments, smile makeovers, teeth whitening, complete and partial dentures, scaling and polishing, teeth straightening, cosmetic dentistry, tooth filling, dental crowns and bridges.

column2: 1132, 1st Floor, Jawaharlal Nehru Road, BEML Layout, 3rd Stage
column43: Dr. Pavan TP had done BDS, MDS is one of the renowned Prosthodontist and Implantologist in Bengaluru. He has completed his Bachelor’s degree from Sri Siddhartha Dental College & Hospital, Tumkur. He further enrolled himself in the country’s premier Prosthodontics and Implantology postgraduate program at AECS Maaruti Dental College & Hospital, Bengaluru under the guidance of eminent Prof. Dr.K Chandrasekharan Nair, to pursue his true interest of transforming people’s lives by restoring beautiful smiles. Dr. Pavan TP has successfully completed ICOI (International Congress of Oral Implantology) recognized certificate program in Implantology.As a Prosthodontist, Dr. Pavan TP deals with the artificial replacement of missing teeth and its associated soft and hard tissues by prosthesis (Crowns, Bridges, Implants, Dentures and Maxillofacial Prosthesis). He is also specialized in cosmetic and aesthetic dental services like Veneers, Smile Designing, tooth whitening etc,. Dr. Pavan TP has extensive knowledge and expertise in the field of dentistry for more than 12 years and always keeps himself updated with contemporary materials, equipments and techniques. His professionalism and patient-friendly approach has helped patients enjoy quality life with excellent dental health and appearance.

Completed from Saveetha University & D.A.Pandu R.V Dental College & Hospital. He is a Professor, He has more than 16 years of Experience in this field. He is a Research Fellow working for his PhD in GSR Hospital, Hyderabad. He is in Collaboration with Netherlands University; Gottingen, Germany university. column2: 20, 2nd Floor, Thubarahalli
column43: Dr. Nishanth Shetty is an energetic and confident health professional who combines a passion for Cosmetic Dentistry, Medical Cosmetology and Trichology with an accomplished technology savvy knack for matching patients with optimal treatments and services to meet their specific aesthetic needs. He has consistently received excellent feedback from his patients. He has an established reputation for proper diagnosis and treatment skills that produce an excellent balance of aesthetics ranging from micro smile-aesthetics to the whole facial outlook makeover. He has over four years' treatment experience, working with progressively more challenging cases and more diverse patients. Dr. Nishant Shetty is an Orthodontist, Implantologist and Aesthetic Medicine Specialist practicing at Whitefield, Indiranagar, Murgeshpalya, Pai Layout and ITPB at Bangalore, Mangalore, and Shimoga and has an experience of over 14 years in aesthetic fields. Dr. Nishanth Shetty practices at Imex Care Clinic in Whitefield, Bangalore and used to practice at Ojus HealthCare branches in Bangalore. He completed BDS from JSS Dental College Hospital in 2007, MDS - Orthodontics & Dentofacial Orthopaedics from Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences, Bangalore, India in 2013 and Certificate of Oral Implantology from Nobel Biocare and Mis Implants India in 2016 and Fellowship in Aesthetic Medicine from University of Greifswald, Germany. He is Invisalign, Clear correct, Flash and D Care Aligner certified.

Professional Summary & Experience:Dr. Senthil Kumar is a highly recommended Dentist and Endodontist with 27 years of overall experience in the fields of Conservative Dentistry, Endodontics, and Implantology. Dr. Kumar completed his BDS from Bangalore University in 1998 and his MDS in Conservative Dentistry & Endodontics from Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences (MS Ramaiah Dental College) in 2006. He is known for his expertise in Micro-endodontics and single-sitting root canal treatments. He has previously served as a consultant at Narayana Hrudayalaya Dental Clinic and runs his own training facility, Seven Hills Dental Academy.II. Core Expertise & Area of Specialization:Dr. Senthil Kumar specializes across three primary fields:• Endodontist• Cosmetic/Aesthetic Dentist• ImplantologistHe frequently consults for:• Single Sitting Root Canal Treatment• Micro-Endodontics• Cosmetic/Aesthetic DentistryIII. List of Services and Treatments:Dr. Senthil Kumar provides comprehensive dental and endodontic services, including:• Cosmetic/Aesthetic Dentistry• Dental Implant Fixing• Crowns and Bridges Fixing• Wisdom Tooth Extraction• Teeth Whitening• Surgical Tooth Extraction• Discolored Tooth Restoration• Complete/Partial Dentures Fixing• Dental SealantIV. Academic Background:• MDS - Conservative Dentistry & Endodontics: Rajiv Gandhi University Of Health Sciences, Bangalore, 2006• BDS: Bangalore University, 1998

column43: Dr. Karthikeyan B.V has completed his under graduation from KVG Dental College Sullia in 2000 and has topped the institution with the highest marks for which, he was awarded ‘Devakiamma Memorial Award’ for his academic excellence. He secured 14th rank in PGCET 2002 and went on to complete his Masters Degree in Periodontics from Govt. Dental College, Bangalore in 2006 and stood 5th in MDS university examination. Later he proceeded to complete Diplomate in National Board (DNB) in 2007 and Post Graduate Certificate in Implantology (P.G.C.O.I) in September 2012. Presently, he is working in Krishnadevaraya College of Dental Sciences as professor and mentoring as a guide to postgraduate students. He is actively involved in several research works and so far to his credit, he has 19 International publications. He is the 1st Indian author to publish a review paper in a journal of Periodontology. He has delivered several national & international Scientific presentations and has secured the best paper award in ISP 2008 conference. Currently, he is serving in the editorial board of various International and National journals and official speaker of Colgate Palmolive India Ltd. Further, he is the associate editor for international journal of periodontic and restorative dentistry. He active interest in continuing dental education has seen him lecture on several courses and conduct various workshops at both the state and National level. He was also awarded Rajya Puraskar by the governor of Karnataka for his service to mankind.

column2: Number 44, 5th Main Road, 2nd Stage, RPC Layout
column43: Dr. Anup Belludi is a highly accomplished academician & Clinician with extensive experience in the field of orthodontics. He holds a BDS (Bachelor of Dental Surgery) and an MDS (Master of Dental Surgery) degree. Dr. Belludi is a Fellow of the World Federation of Orthodontics, United States Currently, Dr. Belludi serves as a professor at KLE's Institute of Dental Sciences, Bangalore, India. He has been actively involved in both academia and clinical practice for the past 25 years. He services at three dental practices in Bangalore: Crystal Dental, Smile Elements, and Vogue Dental. Dr. Belludi has made significant contributions to the dental field through his numerous publications. He has authored over 50 national and 20 international publications, demonstrating his commitment to advancing orthodontic knowledge. As a distinguished dental professional, Dr. Belludi has held several leadership roles and organized prominent dental conferences. He is the Chief Convenor of the Bangalore Orthodontic Study Group and has served as the Past District President of the Indian Dental Association. Dr. Belludi was the Organising Chairperson of the Mid Year Orthodontic Conference in Bangkok, Thailand in 2017, and he will be the Organising Secretary of the Indian Orthodontic Conference in Bangalore in 2024. He has also received the Best Convenor award from the Indian Orthodontic Society in 2017 and 2018. Dr. Belludi's expertise has been recognised internationally, as he has been invited to speak at the University of Malaya, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia and the Prince Philip University in Hong Kong & Thai association of Orthodontists at Bangkok, He has also delivered numerous keynote addresses at national conferences and conducted workshops on orthognathic surgery in various universities. His special interests within orthodontics include orthognathic surgery, temporary anchorage devices (TADS), passive self-ligation (PSL), and Invisalign. Dr. Anup Bellud i a highly regarded professional in the field of orthodontics, known for his expertise, leadership, and contributions to the dental community.

column6: Craniofacial Surgeon, Oral And MaxilloFacial Surgeon
column43: Dr. Krishna Shama Rao is one of the 12 Surgeons in the world presented with the Medal of Honor in Cranio Maxillofacial Surgery. He is a craniofacial surgeon with an expertise in Advanced Dentistry, Cranial Deformity, Facial Cosmetics, Obstructive Sleep Apnoea, Oral & Maxillofacial and Regenerative Medicine. Practicing for the last 41 years, with professional exposure across the world. In addition to his private practice, he has performed numerous surgeries at some of the most prestigious and finest hospitals across India. To help underprivileged families who are unable to afford treatment, Dr. Rao treats them completely free of cost through his charitable organization. He has contributed to several scientific articles and text books. Not just a famous name in the country, Dr. Rao has been instrumental in curing craniofacial anomalies for patients across the world. He has been an honorary advisory for WHO on its panel for global strategies for the prevention of craniofacial anomalies. He has also held the position of the International Professor, University of Minnesota Medical School since 2001.

In addition to his private practice, he has performed numerous surgeries at some of the most prestigious and finest hospitals across India. To help underprivileged families who are unable to afford treatment, Dr. Rao treats them completely free of cost through his charitable organization. He has contributed to several scientific articles and text books. Not just a famous name in the country, Dr. Rao has been instrumental in curing craniofacial anomalies for patients across the world. He has been an honorary advisory for WHO on its panel for global strategies for the prevention of craniofacial anomalies. He has also held the position of the International Professor, University of Minnesota Medical School since 2001.

column43: Syndicate Member,Rajiv Gandhi University of Health SciencesThe Managing Director of Dental Diagnostic Centre at Koramangala and HSR Layout, Dr. H. J. JAIKRISHNA has completed his Bachelors(Bangalore University) and Masters in the speciality of Oral Medicine and Radiology(Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences) securing University third rank(Oral medicine and Radiology) in September 2000. He has more than 20 years of clinical experience. He has served as an academic council member for Rani Chennamma University, Belagavi(2011) and Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences(2014). He had been nominated as a Senate member by the Government of Karnataka from 2012-15. He had been nominated as the Syndicate Member of Bangalore University Central by Government of Karnataka from 16/3/2018 to 30/6/2018. He has been nominated by the Honorable Governor of Karnataka as a Syndicate Member of Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences from 21/8/2018 to 21/8/21. He was member of Karnataka vision group on Oral Health. Presently serving as Syndicate Member of Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences, Bangalore from 13/12/22 Nominated By Government of Karnataka. He has served as a Professor and HOD in Department of Oral Medicine and Radiology till 2015. With his proficiency in the field of dentistry he founded Dental Diagnostic Centre in the year 2001 which is a Multi-speciality Dental Hospital with OPG facility and CBCT centre opened in 2024 in Kormangala. He launched first of its kind, Fully Operational mobile dental van in 2010 and since then conducting free dental checkup camps in and around Bangalore Urban and Rural district. In 2016 he established his second branch in HSR Layout which is also a Multispeciality Dental Hospital with OPG and CBCT facilities. He is an active member of many national and international associations and has attended numerous national and international conferences and is active in community service in and around Bengaluru rural district

column2: Number B002/2, Garden of Eden by Ukn, Main Road
column43: Dr Kaur is a prominent specialist in Airway-Focused Pediatric Dentistry and the founder of Dreamlet Kids Dentistry.After completing her post-graduation in Pediatric and preventive dentistry in 2015, Dr. Kaur has consulted with numerous hospitals. Becoming a mother sowed the seeds for her interest in Pediatric sleep and the importance of breastfeeding. This inspired her to pursue advanced training in pediatric dental sleep. She specializes in various functional orthodontic systems and is a trained myofunctional therapist. Her quest for knowledge led her to learn functional frenuloplasty (tongue tie-release) and become the Indian ambassador for THE BREATHE INSTITUTE.As a pediatric dental sleep specialist, she understands the critical link between crooked teeth, sleep, and breathing. She integrates a holistic approach to foster optimal jaw growth and development, helping children improve their quality of life. She is highly vocal and supportive of prolonged breastfeeding and its benefits for proper growth and development of the craniofacial complex. She prioritizes the prevention of dental diseases and provides the highest quality therapeutic and holistic care for children. Some of the services provided by the doctor are Dental treatment for kids, Myofunctional therapy, Dental sleep medicine (treatment for sleep apnea, snoring, grinding, mouth breathing etc) , Tongue-tie, lip-tie release, Expansion appliances, Myobrace appliances, Space Maintainers, Pulpectomies, pulpotomies, Tooth fractures, Dental prophylaxis, Tooth Extraction, Dental Restorations, Habit correction, and Dental Examinations, natural straightening of teeth etc.

column43: Dr. Nidharshana S. Nair is a highly skilled and experienced orthodontist with over 9 years of expertise in the field of orthodontics and dentofacial orthopedics. With a compassionate and patient-centered approach, Dr. Nair has built a reputation for providing gentle, high-quality care that fosters comfort and confidence in every visit.If you're looking for an orthodontist who combines expertise, dedication, and a personal touch, Dr. Nidharshana S. column2: 146/01, Poonam Complex, K.H.B Main Road, Kaveri Nagar

Dr. Sathish is dedicated to providing utmost care with evidence-based treatment for the correction of facial deformity in restoring Aesthetic and Functional need of an individual. Soon after his Masters in oral and Maxillofacial Surgery, Dr. Sathish underwent further advanced surgical training in Amrita Institute of Medical Sciences Kochi, Kerala & Mangalore, Karnataka and then he obtained his super specialty training fellowship in Cleft and Craniofacial Surgery. His dedication towards his Profession took him to Hong Kong for an International Fellowship in Craniomaxillofacial surgery where he obtained his further advanced training in Orthognathic surgery Aesthetic Facial Surgery. & Craniofacial surgery. His area of interest includes entire spectrum of Cleft & Craniofacial surgery, treatment of facial Fractures, Facial Plastic surgery, corrective jaw surgery ( Orthognathic surgery ) for disproportionate jaws , Distraction Osteogenesis – new technique of bone lengthening for congenital & acquired facial defects, Temporomandibular joint pain & disorders Minor oral surgery and major facial reconstructive procedures. He has 10 years of clinical experience to its credit. Apart from his routine work, he is associated with a US-based NGO which provides cost-free surgeries for the patients born with Cleft and facial defect acting as a chief surgeon he regularly conducts a free medical camp in India and abroad and provides cost-free surgeries to the needy. He is internationally credentialed Cleft surgeon of Operation Smile. Which supports a large number of cost-free facial surgeries across the Globe. During her tenure, she was able to provide skilled dental care services for patients with the most complex medically compromised conditions, such as dementia and Parkinson's, which makes care provision particularly. She has also helped to hire and then trained the entire team and set quality parameters for treatments done at home for medically compromised patients.Her special interests are Paediatric and Geriatric Dentistry and Implantology, but is keen on making quality dental care as pleasant an experience as possible, and removing the aura of fear that many people associate with dentists. column43: Dr.Sathish Vasishta is a Craniomaxillofacial Surgeon (CMF-Surgeon) completed his masters in Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery from S.D.M College of Dental Sciences & Hospital, Dharwad considered as India’s one of the best Institute for Craniomaxillofacial Surgery accredited by NAAC. Dr. Sathish is dedicated to providing utmost care with evidence-based treatment for the correction of facial deformity in restoring Aesthetic and Functional need of an individual. Soon after his Masters in oral and Maxillofacial Surgery, Dr. Sathish underwent further advanced surgical training in Amrita Institute of Medical Sciences Kochi, Kerala & Mangalore, Karnataka and then he obtained his super specialty training fellowship in Cleft and Craniofacial Surgery. His dedication towards his Profession took him to Hong Kong for an International Fellowship in Craniomaxillofacial surgery where he obtained his further advanced training in Orthognathic surgery Aesthetic Facial Surgery. & Craniofacial surgery. His area of interest includes entire spectrum of Cleft & Craniofacial surgery, treatment of facial Fractures, Facial Plastic surgery, corrective jaw surgery ( Orthognathic surgery ) for disproportionate jaws , Distraction Osteogenesis – new technique of bone lengthening for congenital & acquired facial defects, Temporomandibular joint pain & disorders Minor oral surgery and major facial reconstructive procedures. He has 10 years of clinical experience to its credit. Apart from his routine work, he is associated with a US-based NGO which provides cost-free surgeries for the patients born with Cleft and facial defect acting as a chief surgeon he regularly conducts a free medical camp in India and abroad and provides cost-free surgeries to the needy. He is internationally credentialed Cleft surgeon of Operation Smile. Which supports a large number of cost-free facial surgeries across the Globe. He is also part of Aster DM foundation as aster volunteer.

column43: About Dr. Beena GopiFounder & Chief Dentist – Alisa Dental Care, BangaloreIntroductionDr. Beena Gopi is a highly respected dental surgeon with more than 21 years of clinical excellence in the field of dentistry. She is the Founder and Chief Dentist of Alisa Dental Care, a premier multi-specialty clinic located in Richmond Town, Bangalore. Known for her expertise, ethical practice, and compassionate patient care, she has built a reputation as one of the most trusted names in modern dentistry in Bangalore.Education & TrainingBDS (Bachelor of Dental Surgery) – Krishnadevaraya College of Dental Sciences, Bangalore (1997 – 2002)C.C. in Endodontics – National Institute of Clinical Endodontics (NICE), Bangalore (2002 – 2003)This strong academic foundation gave her both the technical expertise and the clinical perspective needed to deliver precision-driven, patient-centered care.Career Journey1997 – 2002 | Academic FoundationCompleted her BDS, developing a keen interest in restorative dentistry and patient comfort.2002 – 2003 | SpecializationGained advanced training in endodontics at NICE, specializing in root canal therapy and restorative techniques.2003 – 2010 | Early PracticeWorked as a dental surgeon in Bangalore, successfully handling a wide range of clinical cases in endodontics, oral rehabilitation, and cosmetic dentistry.2010 – Present | Founder of Alisa Dental CareEstablished Alisa Dental Care, today recognized as a leading multi-specialty dental center. With a team of specialists in orthodontics, pediatric dentistry, implants, prosthodontics, oral surgery, and laser dentistry, the clinic delivers comprehensive treatments under one roof.2015 – Present | Recognition & GrowthCertified as an Invisalign provider, offering modern orthodontic care. Featured in health publications as a promoter of preventive oral healthcare. Earned a reputation for painless procedures, transparency, and patient-first care.SpecializationsEndodontics – painless root canal treatments, restorative careCosmetic Dentistry – smile makeovers, veneers, aesthetic restorationsOral Rehabilitation – full-mouth rehabilitation, restorative solutionsInvisalign & Orthodontics – advanced teeth alignment treatmentsPreventive & Pediatric Dentistry – long-term oral health focus for familiesAchievements & RecognitionOver two decades of clinical experience, with thousands of successful treatments.Among the early adopters of digital dentistry, Invisalign, and laser-assisted treatments in Bangalore.Consistently rated highly by patients on platforms like Practo, praised for her gentle, precise, and ethical care.Featured in health and lifestyle media, including The National Reader, for her work in preventive oral health awareness.Actively involved in dental education and mentorship, guiding young dentists in clinical skill and ethical practice.Regularly conducts oral health awareness programs, emphasizing the link between oral hygiene and overall wellness.About Alisa Dental CareFounded in 2010, Alisa Dental Care is Dr. Beena Gopi’s vision of a modern dental practice that combines cutting-edge technology with compassionate care. The clinic is equipped with:Digital imaging and diagnosticsLaser-assisted treatmentsInternational-standard sterilization protocolsMulti-specialty dental experts across orthodontics, implants, prosthodontics, and moreThe clinic is widely recognized for providing world-class care at accessible costs, making advanced dentistry available to patients of all ages.Philosophy of CareFor Dr. Beena Gopi, dentistry is more than a medical service—it is about restoring confidence, protecting long-term health, and improving quality of life. She combines clinical precision with a warm, empathetic approach, ensuring every patient feels informed, comfortable, and cared for. Her practice is guided by three principles:Ethics – Transparency in diagnosis and treatment planning.Excellence – Precision-driven, evidence-based dental care.Empathy – Treating patients with compassion and respect.ConclusionWith a career marked by dedication, innovation, and integrity, Dr. Beena Gopi continues to shape modern dentistry in Bangalore. Through her expertise, leadership, and patient-first approach, she has transformed Alisa Dental Care into a trusted destination for comprehensive dental solutions, while inspiring healthier smiles and better lives.

column43: About Dr. Beena GopiFounder & Chief Dentist – Alisa Dental Care, BangaloreIntroductionDr. Beena Gopi is a highly respected dental surgeon with more than 21 years of clinical excellence in the field of dentistry. She is the Founder and Chief Dentist of Alisa Dental Care, a premier multi-specialty clinic located in Richmond Town, Bangalore. Known for her expertise, ethical practice, and compassionate patient care, she has built a reputation as one of the most trusted names in modern dentistry in Bangalore.Education & TrainingBDS (Bachelor of Dental Surgery) – Krishnadevaraya College of Dental Sciences, Bangalore (1997 – 2002)C.C. in Endodontics – National Institute of Clinical Endodontics (NICE), Bangalore (2002 – 2003)This strong academic foundation gave her both the technical expertise and the clinical perspective needed to deliver precision-driven, patient-centered care.Career Journey1997 – 2002 | Academic FoundationCompleted her BDS, developing a keen interest in restorative dentistry and patient comfort.2002 – 2003 | SpecializationGained advanced training in endodontics at NICE, specializing in root canal therapy and restorative techniques.2003 – 2010 | Early PracticeWorked as a dental surgeon in Bangalore, successfully handling a wide range of clinical cases in endodontics, oral rehabilitation, and cosmetic dentistry.2010 – Present | Founder of Alisa Dental CareEstablished Alisa Dental Care, today recognized as a leading multi-specialty dental center. With a team of specialists in orthodontics, pediatric dentistry, implants, prosthodontics, oral surgery, and laser dentistry, the clinic delivers comprehensive treatments under one roof.2015 – Present | Recognition & GrowthCertified as an Invisalign provider, offering modern orthodontic care. Featured in health publications as a promoter of preventive oral healthcare. Earned a reputation for painless procedures, transparency, and patient-first care.SpecializationsEndodontics – painless root canal treatments, restorative careCosmetic Dentistry – smile makeovers, veneers, aesthetic restorationsOral Rehabilitation – full-mouth rehabilitation, restorative solutionsInvisalign & Orthodontics – advanced teeth alignment treatmentsPreventive & Pediatric Dentistry – long-term oral health focus for familiesAchievements & RecognitionOver two decades of clinical experience, with thousands of successful treatments.Among the early adopters of digital dentistry, Invisalign, and laser-assisted treatments in Bangalore.Consistently rated highly by patients on platforms like Practo, praised for her gentle, precise, and ethical care.Featured in health and lifestyle media, including The National Reader, for her work in preventive oral health awareness.Actively involved in dental education and mentorship, guiding young dentists in clinical skill and ethical practice.Regularly conducts oral health awareness programs, emphasizing the link between oral hygiene and overall wellness.About Alisa Dental CareFounded in 2010, Alisa Dental Care is Dr. Beena Gopi’s vision of a modern dental practice that combines cutting-edge technology with compassionate care. The clinic is equipped with:Digital imaging and diagnosticsLaser-assisted treatmentsInternational-standard sterilization protocolsMulti-specialty dental experts across orthodontics, implants, prosthodontics, and moreThe clinic is widely recognized for providing world-class care at accessible costs, making advanced dentistry available to patients of all ages.Philosophy of CareFor Dr. Beena Gopi, dentistry is more than a medical service—it is about restoring confidence, protecting long-term health, and improving quality of life. She combines clinical precision with a warm, empathetic approach, ensuring every patient feels informed, comfortable, and cared for. Her practice is guided by three principles:Ethics – Transparency in diagnosis and treatment planning.Excellence – Precision-driven, evidence-based dental care.Empathy – Treating patients with compassion and respect.ConclusionWith a career marked by dedication, innovation, and integrity, Dr. Beena Gopi continues to shape modern dentistry in Bangalore. Through her expertise, leadership, and patient-first approach, she has transformed Alisa Dental Care into a trusted destination for comprehensive dental solutions, while inspiring healthier smiles and better lives.

column43: Dr. Sreedhar Reddy Pothula is a maxillofacial & facial plastic surgeon, a world class doctor, is trained abroad to become a master in the Hair Transplant Surgery and has made a revolution in designing natural and artistic hair lines.He was trained in FUT , trychophytic closure, hairline design, twillight anaesthesia etc at Ontario, Canada.Dr. Sreedhar Reddy Pothula is a maxillofacial & facial plastic surgeon, a world class doctor, is trained abroad to become a master in the Hair Transplant Surgery and has made a revolution in designing natural and artistic hair lines. Dr Sreedhar Reddy Pothula (Maxillo Facial & Plastic Surgeon), is a Consultant in Cosmetic Surgery with post graduation. He was gem of doctors who graduated from JJMMC and CODS College, being one of the most respected medical institutions in India. After finishing his graduation he did post-graduation in surgery from the CODS, Davanagere, Karnataka. He was Chief Resident in the department of Maxillofacial surgery in CODS. He was trained in FUT, trychophytic closure, hairline design, twillight anaesthesia etc at Ontario, Canada. He is trained in various other cosmetic procedures like facial profile change surgeries, nose surgeries and specialization in hair transplant surgeries. Dr. Sreedhar Reddy performed several thousands of hair transplants (with 1000 to 4500+ follicular hair transplant with high dense packing and super mega sessions consistantly) and cosmetic surgeries with optimum success rates till date. Cosmetic surgeon performing hair transplant surgeries with world class technology and precision will surely help the patients. This rare combination of skill with experience is only available at "Pioneer Hair Care" center, Bangalore India. Follicular Hair Transplantation and Cosmetic surgery are done with latest class of art equipment here at Pioneer Hair Care.

column43: Dr. Revathi, a Specialist Pediatric Dentist, brings an impressive 15 years of experience in pediatric dentistry. She is adept at providing the full spectrum of dental services for babies, children, and teens,Also trained to treat special needs patients and manage uncooperative and anxious young patients.She completed her BDS from Sharavathi dental college and MDS from government dental college & research institute BangaloreHer other areas of expertise include treatment under general anesthesia and nitrous oxide (laughing gas) sedation, Invisalign and Myobrace for children and teens, habit-breaking appliances, and interceptive orthodontics, which involves early intervention to prevent the development of malocclusions. Over the past years, She has gained a great experience in her field with notable success in treating a variety of comprehensive pediatric dentistry cases, both chairside and under conscious sedation or general anesthesia as needed.She believes that every child has the right to receive the best dental care no matter how challenging their case could be. She has a special interest in offering dental care to children with special needs and medically-compromised children and adolescents.Her personable nature allows children and parents to feel comfortable and at ease. Also has the ability to determine the long-term effects of dental procedures in children and is trained in dental trauma management, dental emergencies, and comprehensive orthodontics.Outside the dentist’s office, Dr. Revathi is proudly recognized for authoring a few different publications in the field of pediatric dentistry. column43: Dr. Sanjog Agarwal is a dynamic and tech-savvy dental professional redefining patient care through a unique blend of clinical excellence and genuine human connection. Known for his warm smile and approachable demeanor, Dr. Agarwal ensures that every patient feels comfortable, informed, and at ease—from the first consultation to the final result.With expertise in advanced dental implantology, full-mouth rehabilitation, and aesthetic dentistry, his focus is on delivering natural, lasting smiles through precision, innovation, and care. His patient-first philosophy makes every visit not only stress-free but truly enjoyable.Dr. Agarwal’s academic foundation was laid at the prestigious SDM Dental College, Dharwad, where he earned his BDS degree and developed a strong commitment to clinical excellence. He went on to pursue his MDS in Prosthodontics and Implantology at Saveetha Dental College, Chennai—India’s top-ranked dental school (NIRF 2024) and among the top 25 globally (QS 2024). His outstanding performance earned him the Best Alumni Award, celebrating both academic distinction and patient-centric care.His pursuit of excellence took him beyond borders—training at globally acclaimed institutions like the University of Zurich, University of Milan, and the National University of Singapore (NUS). These global experiences have enriched his practice with cutting-edge techniques, enabling him to bring world-class dental solutions to Bengaluru.Patients consistently appreciate Dr. Agarwal not only for his advanced clinical skill but also for the infectious energy he brings into the operatory. Whether it’s through his use of modern digital dentistry or his honest, empathetic communication, he makes dental care feel refreshingly human.For Dr. Sanjog Agarwal, a confident smile isn’t just the goal—it’s the journey he’s honored to walk with each patient.

column43: Dr. Suma Lanka BDS., Certified Implantologist, Smile Designing Expert.Dr. Suma is a highly skilled and compassionate Dental Surgeon with over 16 years of clinical experience delivering personalized and painless dental care. column43: Dr. S. Srushya, BDS, MDSOrthodontist & Dentofacial Orthopaedist | Invisalign-Certified | Clinical Practitioner Dr. S. Srushya is a certified orthodontist with a Bachelor of Dental Surgery (BDS) and a Master’s degree (MDS) in Orthodontics and Dentofacial Orthopaedics from Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences. Her clinical expertise spans the full spectrum of orthodontic care, including growth modification, fixed mechanotherapy, and clear aligner therapy. She is particularly interested in managing complex malocclusions and delivering evidence-based, patient-focused treatments. Dr. Srushya is Invisalign-certified, with extensive experience in planning and managing complex malocclusions using digital tools and aligner-based techniques. She has participated in academic conferences and continuing dental education programs, consistently aiming to integrate the latest clinical advances into everyday practice. Whether you're visiting for a routine check-up or need more extensive dental work, Apollo Dental Clinic is your trusted partner for maintaining a healthy, beautiful smile.

column43: Dr Shylesh Shetty is amongst the pioneers of microscope centered endodontics in the country.Dr. Shylesh Shetty completed his BDS in the year 1999 and went on to do his masters in endodontics. Soon after the completion of his masters in the year 2004, Dr. Shetty held faculty positions at the Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences. Between the years 2004 - 09 Dr. Shetty was a consultant Endodontist at many of central and east Bangalore's leading dental practices.Realizing that the highest standard of endodontic care required was not deliverable as a consultant in a "General Dentistry" set-ups, Dr.Shylesh Shetty set up the "Root Canal center"- in the year 2008- a unique specialty endodontic practice, the cornerstone of the practice being the surgical microscope - a tool that sets the standard of excellence. Root canal treatment is performed completely under the operating microscope which allows complete visualization of the main and accessory root canal system and requires a high degree of skill and training, the vision of successful treatment outcome being based on the use of cutting edge technology, equipment, knowledge, and skill - the unique combination that results in very high long-term success.Keen on raising the bar of endodontic standards in India, Dr. Shylesh Shetty is passionately involved in training endodontists on the latest advances in endodontic techniques and concepts through lectures and hands-on training at his " Micro- endodontic" training facility in Bangalore.“Excellence Dental”- was set up by Dr Shetty in June 2016, as an extension of the “Root canal centre” with the intent of providing the highest global standards of care across dental specialties under one roof. To this end, Dr. Shetty has put together a team of carefully selected set of practitioners and specialists chosen for their knowledge, experience and skill in their respective fields. This closely curated team brings together a new generation of dental craftsmanship.

column43: COVID PROTOCOL (MAY 2020)Dr Ganesh Shetty and his staff follow the most stringent protocol of disinfection and sanitization to ensure complete safety of their patients. A few of the extra precautions and machinery used to achieve this are mentioned below- 1)Class B autoclave(EURONDA) for sterilizing instruments2)U.V Sterilizers for additional sterilization3)Continuous disinfection of all surfaces in the operatory and waiting area4)Fogging machine to sanitize all upholstery and dental chairs5)Cold sterilization of dental instruments 6)Ensuring that patients adhere to strict appointment times to minimize waiting or crowding in the reception area7)Hand sanitizers and povidone-iodine microbicidal rinse given to all patients8)Extra-oral suction used to minimize aerosol generationDr. Ganesh Shetty practices at Dental and Orthodontic Clinic. Worked in M S Ramaiah Dental College in the Department of Oral Pathology. Currently starting work in the second branch of Dental and Orthodontic Clinic. With more than 14 years of experience in providing dental service to hundreds of customers, Dr. Ganesh Shetty is one of the premier dentists in Bangalore.

column43: Dr. Mohommad Pasha is a young and dynamic dental specialist doctor, who practices dental science with an eye of meticulous craftsmanship and help the patients to attain perfect happy smile.He completed his BDS as 'Best Outgoing Student' of the batch in 2003 and MDS in Prosthodontics in 2006 from V.S Dental College, KIMS Hospital in Bangalore, affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences. He completed Fellowship and Diplomat credentials at International Congress of Oral Implantology (USA) in 2009 and 2011 respectively. He has been trained in the field of Dental Rehabilitation and Implantology in many advanced courses across the globe including France, Germany, Spain, South Korea, Dubai and Thailand. He has worked in V.S Dental College and Hospital (KIMS) as Associate Professor from 2006 to 2015. He is a visiting consultant Implantologist at Fortis Hospital, Bangalore. He is also a visiting specialist prosthodontist and implantology at Sunny Dental Centre, Sharjah, UAE.He maintains two private practices in Bangalore (Lal Bagh West Gate and BTM 2nd Stage) focusing mainly on cosmetic dentistry, implantology, and full mouth rehabilitation. Over the course of his career, he has gained valuable experience in the general dental procedures such as gum treatment, teeth filling and restoration; root canal fillings, removable and fixed dentures, prevention of tooth decay, children's teeth care, braces and geriatric dentistry.Dr. Pasha specializes in the field of prosthodontics and implantology, which involves solution for replacement of single missing tooth to full mouth rehabilitation. He has pioneered the art and science of Dental Implantology for over 12 years.

column43: Dr Deepak S completed his Bachelors and Masters of dentistry in the speciality of Maxillofacial Surgery from the reputed Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences, Karnataka, INDIA and obtained his Fellowship and DIPLOMATE in oral Implantology from International Congress of Oral Implantology ICOI ( USA). He has more than fourteen years of clinical experience in various areas of maxillofacial surgery like Trauma care management, Orthognathic surgery, Oral cancer and pathologies and Implant dentistry. He and his team were the first to implement the technique of Hybrid Distraction Osteogenesis in Cleft lip and palate patients which was also presented and appreciated in various international surgical forums. He has advanced training and high specialization with more than five international certification programmes in the field of Advanced Implant dentistry. He has performed extensive work in the areas of Sinus lift augmentation and onlay bone grafting in aiding the implant prosthetic rehabilitation of highly compromised clinical scenarios with minimal to “NO” native jaw bones. He is an active academician holding several posts in the reputed Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences, Bangalore and Indira Gandhi National Open University, Delhi. He has a series of scientific paper presentations in the World Congress of Dentistry and International Association of Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery and has published journals on interesting clinical cases and research studies that adds to his surgical skills and professional experience.

column43: Dr Deepak S completed his Bachelors and Masters of dentistry in the speciality of Maxillofacial Surgery from the reputed Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences, Karnataka, INDIA and obtained his Fellowship and DIPLOMATE in oral Implantology from International Congress of Oral Implantology ICOI ( USA). He has more than fourteen years of clinical experience in various areas of maxillofacial surgery like Trauma care management, Orthognathic surgery, Oral cancer and pathologies and Implant dentistry. He and his team were the first to implement the technique of Hybrid Distraction Osteogenesis in Cleft lip and palate patients which was also presented and appreciated in various international surgical forums. He has advanced training and high specialization with more than five international certification programmes in the field of Advanced Implant dentistry. He has performed extensive work in the areas of Sinus lift augmentation and onlay bone grafting in aiding the implant prosthetic rehabilitation of highly compromised clinical scenarios with minimal to “NO” native jaw bones. He is an active academician holding several posts in the reputed Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences, Bangalore and Indira Gandhi National Open University, Delhi. He has a series of scientific paper presentations in the World Congress of Dentistry and International Association of Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery and has published journals on interesting clinical cases and research studies that adds to his surgical skills and professional experience.

column6: Orthodontist, Dentist, Dentofacial Orthopedist, Dental Surgeon
column43: Dr. Shivaprasad Gaonkar’s journey in the field of orthodontics is nothing short of inspiring. With a strong foundation established through his Bachelor of Dental Surgery from the esteemed Vydehi Institute of Dental Sciences and further refined by a Masters in Orthodontics and Dentofacial Orthopaedics, he embodies the commitment and passion necessary for truly transformative work in dentistry. With over 15 years of clinical experience and 12 years dedicated exclusively to orthodontics, Dr. Gaonkar has touched countless lives by expertly treating a wide variety of orthodontic conditions. His proficiency with both braces and advanced aligner systems showcases his dedication to delivering the highest standard of patient care.What sets Dr. Gaonkar apart is not just his extensive clinical skills but also his forward-thinking approach to the ever-evolving field of orthodontics. His keen interest in Minimal Intervention Orthodontics, Functional Jaw Corrections, Surgical Orthodontics, and Clear Aligner Therapy demonstrates his eagerness to embrace innovation and modern techniques. This adaptability not only enhances his own practice but also inspires those around him, ensuring that his patients receive cutting-edge care while he remains a beacon of progress in the field.As an Associate Professor at Dayananda Sagar College of Dental Sciences, Dr. Gaonkar plays a vital role in shaping the future of orthodontics. His enthusiastic engagement with postgraduate students fosters an environment of inquiry and innovation, encouraging aspiring professionals to reach their full potential. By sharing his knowledge and experience, Dr. Gaonkar empowers the next generation of orthodontists, instilling in them the same passion for patient-centric care that has guided his own illustrious career.

column43: Dr. Shivaprasad Gaonkar’s journey in the field of orthodontics is nothing short of inspiring. With a strong foundation established through his Bachelor of Dental Surgery from the esteemed Vydehi Institute of Dental Sciences and further refined by a Masters in Orthodontics and Dentofacial Orthopaedics, he embodies the commitment and passion necessary for truly transformative work in dentistry. With over 15 years of clinical experience and 12 years dedicated exclusively to orthodontics, Dr. Gaonkar has touched countless lives by expertly treating a wide variety of orthodontic conditions. His proficiency with both braces and advanced aligner systems showcases his dedication to delivering the highest standard of patient care.What sets Dr. Gaonkar apart is not just his extensive clinical skills but also his forward-thinking approach to the ever-evolving field of orthodontics. His keen interest in Minimal Intervention Orthodontics, Functional Jaw Corrections, Surgical Orthodontics, and Clear Aligner Therapy demonstrates his eagerness to embrace innovation and modern techniques. This adaptability not only enhances his own practice but also inspires those around him, ensuring that his patients receive cutting-edge care while he remains a beacon of progress in the field.As an Associate Professor at Dayananda Sagar College of Dental Sciences, Dr. Gaonkar plays a vital role in shaping the future of orthodontics. His enthusiastic engagement with postgraduate students fosters an environment of inquiry and innovation, encouraging aspiring professionals to reach their full potential. By sharing his knowledge and experience, Dr. Gaonkar empowers the next generation of orthodontists, instilling in them the same passion for patient-centric care that has guided his own illustrious career.

column43: A happy smile encompasses tranquility of mind. Pearly white teeth are often bitten by dark cavities. Treatment of these may involve just restoring it with a good filling or treating the entire tooth, to not only remove the decay but also the infection. The myth that clouds the complex root canal treatment is that it is painful and an unpleasant experience. Endodontists with their expertise in root canal treatment not only ensure better success rates but also ensure that it is almost painless. Dr. Abhishek Shetty completed his bachelors in dental surgery from SDM college of dental sciences and hospital, Dharwad and his masters in dental surgery from AECS Maruthi Dental College. The treatment motto adopted by Dr. Abhishek is to perform root canal treatment with utmost “TLC” – (tender loving care). Dr. Abhishek believes in harmoniously restoring the teeth to its anatomical structure and thus making his fillings the best in class.

column43: Dr. Kunal Shet is the Head of the Dental Department at Nanavati Hospital, Mumbai and the Founder of Orthosquare Multispeciality Dental clinic with more than 110 clinics.Located at Mumbai, Delhi, Bangalore, Pune, Chennai , Hyderabad , Gujarat Orthosquare is awarded the 'Best Dental Chain of Clinic' consisting of a teamof Internationally trained professionals.With 14 years of experience in Dental Implants and Immediate Loading Implants, he has delivered perfect smiles for more than 22,000 patients. As an Internationally recognized Implantologist, he is respected for his convictiontowards work and dedication towards his patients.He is an experienced professional who shares the belief that care should be far-reaching and courteous. Completing his Masters in Cortical Implantology from Italy, he is always looking to expand his expertise further. Trained by experts in the field of Invisible braces by Clear Path and Invisalign, Dr. Kunal is a certified Lingual Orthodontist and Invisible Braces Specialist.Being a Dentofacial Orthopedics, he has successfully treated patients for Growth Modification in Children and Orthognathic Surgery to change imperfect faces in Adults.Over the last decade of his clinical practice, he has rich experience in Dental Implants and Immediate Teeth Loading in just 3 days. Being an Internationally trained Implantologist in USA and with the constant success rate so far, he has performed more than 60000 Dental Implants.His favorite notion about the practice is being able to change a patient's perception of dentistry and empower them about the importance of oral health. Nominated three years in a row for Excellence in Orthodontics, Dr. Kunal successfully treats systemically compromised and globally rejected cases with implants. With an excellent success rate of providing Dentistry in 130 dental clinics and many more to visit, he believes in Enhancing smiles and providing patients with satisfaction.Thus summing up all the merits, he is a skilled Dentofacial Orthopedic and Orthodontist.

column6: Dentist, Implantologist, Oral And MaxilloFacial Surgeon
column43: Dr. Bipin Chandra Reddy a graduate in 1999 from Gulbarga University, went on to complete Masters in the specialty of Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery from M R Ambedkar Dental College, Bengaluru in 2004.He later joined Kidwai Institute of Oncology as a Senior Resident in the Department of Oral Oncology and Reconstruction for a period of 2years, where he trained in various oral cancer surgeries. He was awarded a certificate of good standing here.He later joined as a Faculty in the Department of Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery at The Oxford Dental College & Hospital. During his tenure, he was a postgraduate teacher and Guide. Besides being actively involved in academics he has numerous National and International publications to his credit and has delivered lectures in many conferences. He also got the opportunity to serve in the Department of Dentistry in the famous Jayadeva Institute of Cardiology.Dr. Bipin Chandra Reddy has an experience of 13 yrs and is a Consultant Oral & Maxillofacial Surgeon in numerous hospitals in and around Bangalore. He has his own practice at JAWS Dental Clinic and Implant Center, Koramangala. He also consults numerous dental clinics for minor surgical procedures in Bangalore. He specializes in Dental Implant surgeries, laser surgeries, oral cancer surgeries, facial trauma procedures and other minor surgical procedures. He is a part of the Institute of Dental education and aesthetics (IDEA) where he lectures and trains students in implant procedures.Dr. Bipin’s achievements and accreditation include- • Fellowship in Implant Dentistry under International Congress Of Oral Implantology,• Diplomat in Implant Dentistry under International Congress Of Oral Implantology,• Clinical Mastership in Oral Implantology ( Stony Brook University, USA),• Implant externship program- Dental XP (Stony Brook School of Dental Medicine, State University of New York)• Fellowship of Aesthetic Medicine (Melamed)

column43: A happy smile encompasses tranquility of mind. Pearly white teeth are often bitten by dark cavities. Treatment of these may involve just restoring it with a good filling or treating the entire tooth, to not only remove the decay but also the infection. The myth that clouds the complex root canal treatment is that it is painful and an unpleasant experience. Endodontists with their expertise in root canal treatment not only ensure better success rates but also ensure that it is almost painless. Dr. Abhishek Shetty completed his bachelors in dental surgery from SDM college of dental sciences and hospital, Dharwad and his masters in dental surgery from AECS Maruthi Dental College. The treatment motto adopted by Dr. Abhishek is to perform root canal treatment with utmost “TLC” – (tender loving care). Dr. Abhishek believes in harmoniously restoring the teeth to its anatomical structure and thus making his fillings the best in class.

column43: With 22 years of practice, Forty-Six-year-old award-winning Ayurveda Health Practitioner Dr. Prashanth Shivarudraiah Acharya, B.A.M.S, M.S (AYU), Ph.D., F.I.C.A, F.A.G.E, is one of the earliest Ayurveda practitioners of Bangalore city. He is a renowned specialist providing non-invasive root cause treatments for Spine and related Muscle, Bone & Joint conditions; and various lifestyle disorders.He has successfully treated more than 3500 patients, halting many avoidable surgeries and providing lasting cure for many conditions, among others, such as Spinal Injury, Slip Disc, Sciatica, Lumbar and Cervical Spondylosis / Spondylitis, Rheumatoid Arthritis, Osteo Arthritis, Disc Herniation, Disc Prolapse, Degeneration of Spine, He also excels in treatment of various Lifestyle Disorders such as Diabetes, Hypertension, Hypo / Hyper Thyroidism, PCOS, Obesity, COPD, Liver Disorders, Chronic Renal Failure, Depression, Stroke, Weight loss and other maladies associated with the 21st century lifestyle. He has achieved impressive results in treating treatment of Diabetic neuropathy and 100% outcome in Cosmetology.Dr.Prashanth S. Acharya holds a Bachelor’s degree in Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery from Govt. Ayurvedic Medical College, Bangalore University. He is also a Master’s degree holder in the surgical specialty of Ayurveda - Shalya Tantra - from the Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences, Bangalore. He secured his Ph.D. in Panchakarma for his study on 'Low backache including lumbar disc lesions & disc degenerations' from Tilak Ayurved Mahavidyalaya, Pune University, Pune.Dr. Prashanth S. Acharya, the Medical Director of Arth Ayurveda Hospitals at Indiranagar, Bangalore, is also the Founder Director and Managing Trustee of the ARTH Ayurveda Group, recognized as “India's Most Admired Brand 2017-18" by White Page International (WPI) and the UK Asian Business Council. Personally, Dr.Prashanth S. Acharya is one of the rare holders of a Ph.D. in the non-surgical management of Slip Disc in India. A recipient of many awards, Dr. Prashanth S. Acharya was decorated with twin honours during March 2018. He was declared "India's Most Inspirational Business Leader" at the Sixth Edition of Asian Brand & Leadership Conclave in Singapore and also honoured as India’s ‘Best Ayurveda Healthcare Entrepreneur-Practitioner of the Year” at the 8th MT India Healthcare Awards. An International Vaidya Member of Association of Ayurvedic Professionals of North America (AAPNA), he is the recipient of AAPNA’s 2014 Dhanwantari Award and 2012 Atreya Award. He won the NADA CHETANA, Karnataka State Award in 2006. Arth Ayurveda partners recognized institutions and organizations all over the world including the Association of Ayurvedic Professionals of North America (AAPNA); the International University of yoga and Ayurveda, Inc. Florida USA; the Europe Ayurveda Academy (EAA), Ireland; and the Union Yoga and Ayurveda, Singapore, among others.A man who wears many hats, Dr. Prashanth S. Acharya is also the Managing Trustee, Atreya Charitable Trust; the Medical Director of Atreya Ayurvedic Medical College, Hospital & Research Centre, Doddaballapura (Bangalore) - declared India’s “Best Medical College & Hospital for Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery 2018” by global analytical company Worldwide Achievers; and the Founder Director - PoornaPrajna AyurPharma Pvt Ltd - a complete Ayurvedic Pharmaceutical Company.

column43: Dr. Sumana Patavardhan K.S. stands at the forefront of Ayurvedic medicine, bringing over two decades of profound expertise and a compassionate approach to her practice. Educated at the esteemed Sri Sri College of Ayurveda and Research, her journey has been marked by remarkable achievements and a commitment to advancing the field of Ayurveda.*Education and Achievements*Dr. Patavardhan earned her MD from Sri Sri College of Ayurveda and Research, where her dedication and academic excellence earned her the 9th rank in the prestigious Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences. Her thirst for knowledge extends beyond academia, as she has presented papers at national and international seminars and contributed to international journals, enriching the global understanding of Ayurvedic practices.With 23 years of hands-on experience in Ayurvedic medicine, Dr. Patavardhan has honed her diagnostic skills, specializing in Nadi pareeksha (pulse diagnosis). This traditional method allows her to adeptly identify subtle imbalances in the body, guiding her precise treatment strategies.*Treatment Specializations*Dr. Patavardhan's practice covers a broad spectrum of health conditions, including lifestyle disorders such as diabetes, hypertension, thyroid abnormalities, and PCOD. Her expertise extends to reproductive health with specialized treatments for infertility, and musculoskeletal disorders including spine care, joint care, and arthritis management. She also addresses developmental disorders like autism, ADHD, and concentration deficits in children with tailored Ayurvedic therapies. Dermatological conditions such as psoriasis, eczema, fungal infections, and excessive hair fall find comprehensive solutions under her care. Additionally, she manages allergic conditions affecting both the skin and upper respiratory system.

column43: With 22 years of practice, Forty-Six-year-old award-winning Ayurveda Health Practitioner Dr. Prashanth Shivarudraiah Acharya, B.A.M.S, M.S (AYU), Ph.D., F.I.C.A, F.A.G.E, is one of the earliest Ayurveda practitioners of Bangalore city. He is a renowned specialist providing non-invasive root cause treatments for Spine and related Muscle, Bone & Joint conditions; and various lifestyle disorders.He has successfully treated more than 3500 patients, halting many avoidable surgeries and providing lasting cure for many conditions, among others, such as Spinal Injury, Slip Disc, Sciatica, Lumbar and Cervical Spondylosis / Spondylitis, Rheumatoid Arthritis, Osteo Arthritis, Disc Herniation, Disc Prolapse, Degeneration of Spine, He also excels in treatment of various Lifestyle Disorders such as Diabetes, Hypertension, Hypo / Hyper Thyroidism, PCOS, Obesity, COPD, Liver Disorders, Chronic Renal Failure, Depression, Stroke, Weight loss and other maladies associated with the 21st century lifestyle. He has achieved impressive results in treating treatment of Diabetic neuropathy and 100% outcome in Cosmetology.Dr.Prashanth S. Acharya holds a Bachelor’s degree in Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery from Govt. Ayurvedic Medical College, Bangalore University. He is also a Master’s degree holder in the surgical specialty of Ayurveda - Shalya Tantra - from the Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences, Bangalore. He secured his Ph.D. in Panchakarma for his study on 'Low backache including lumbar disc lesions & disc degenerations' from Tilak Ayurved Mahavidyalaya, Pune University, Pune.Dr. Prashanth S. Acharya, the Medical Director of Arth Ayurveda Hospitals at Indiranagar, Bangalore, is also the Founder Director and Managing Trustee of the ARTH Ayurveda Group, recognized as “India's Most Admired Brand 2017-18" by White Page International (WPI) and the UK Asian Business Council. Personally, Dr.Prashanth S. Acharya is one of the rare holders of a Ph.D. in the non-surgical management of Slip Disc in India. A recipient of many awards, Dr. Prashanth S. Acharya was decorated with twin honours during March 2018. He was declared "India's Most Inspirational Business Leader" at the Sixth Edition of Asian Brand & Leadership Conclave in Singapore and also honoured as India’s ‘Best Ayurveda Healthcare Entrepreneur-Practitioner of the Year” at the 8th MT India Healthcare Awards. An International Vaidya Member of Association of Ayurvedic Professionals of North America (AAPNA), he is the recipient of AAPNA’s 2014 Dhanwantari Award and 2012 Atreya Award. He won the NADA CHETANA, Karnataka State Award in 2006. Arth Ayurveda partners recognized institutions and organizations all over the world including the Association of Ayurvedic Professionals of North America (AAPNA); the International University of yoga and Ayurveda, Inc. Florida USA; the Europe Ayurveda Academy (EAA), Ireland; and the Union Yoga and Ayurveda, Singapore, among others.A man who wears many hats, Dr. Prashanth S. Acharya is also the Managing Trustee, Atreya Charitable Trust; the Medical Director of Atreya Ayurvedic Medical College, Hospital & Research Centre, Doddaballapura (Bangalore) - declared India’s “Best Medical College & Hospital for Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery 2018” by global analytical company Worldwide Achievers; and the Founder Director - PoornaPrajna AyurPharma Pvt Ltd - a complete Ayurvedic Pharmaceutical Company.

column43: Dr Vijayananda hiremath is a renowned Consultant and Surgeon (Ayurveda) in Bengaluru, who has pursued post graduate in Ayurvedic surgery and fellowship in Emergency medical services and has been on the field for 10 yrs. column2: Number 740, 7th Cross Road, 3rd Block
column43: Discover Holistic Healing with Dr. Swathi R at Ethnic Health CareWelcome to Ethnic Health in Koramangala, Bangalore, where ancient wisdom meets compassionate care under the expert guidance of Dr. Swathi R (BAMS).With 4 years of dedicated experience in the profound traditions of Siddha and Ayurveda, Dr. Swathi has cultivated a unique, integrative approach to wellness. She believes in addressing the root cause of health concerns, empowering the body’s innate ability to heal and thrive naturally.Her Expertise & Specialized Focus:· Natural Fertility & Reproductive Wellness: Dr. Swathi specializes in providing holistic, evidence-informed support for couples and individuals on their fertility journey. She offers personalized regimens using time-tested herbal formulations, dietary guidance (Pathyam), and lifestyle corrections to enhance reproductive health, regulate cycles, improve egg & sperm quality, and create an optimal environment for conception—all through gentle, natural means.· General Alignment & Holistic Health: Beyond fertility, her practice is dedicated to restoring balance and "alignment" to the entire system. This includes expert management of: · Digestive disorders (IBS, Acidity, Gut Health) · Women’s health (PCOS, menstrual irregularities, hormonal imbalances) · Musculoskeletal issues (Arthritis, Back Pain, Inflammation) · Skin and hair conditions · Stress, anxiety, and fatigue management · Detoxification and immune-boosting therapiesWhat to Expect at the Clinic:At Ethnic Health Care Siddha Clinic, you will experience a warm, confidential, and non-judgmental environment. Dr. Swathi takes the time to listen deeply, conducting a thorough assessment through traditional diagnostic methods. Each treatment plan is meticulously tailored, combining:· Classical Siddha Herbal Medicines· Personalized Dietary and Lifestyle Plans· Guidance on Yogic Practices & BreathworkIf you are seeking a natural, sustainable path to health—whether navigating fertility challenges or striving for overall vitality—Dr. Swathi R provides the wisdom, experience, and compassionate support to guide you toward lasting well-being.

column43: Dr. Sharad Kulkarni is a renowned Ayurveda Consultant and Surgeon based in Bengaluru, India, with a Master’s and Ph.D. in Shalya Tantra (Ayurvedic Surgery) with certification in Reproductive Health. He is also a respected author and a prominent health vlogger, known for creating impactful content in Kannada, English, and Hindi. His health education videos, featured on platforms like Vijay Karnataka, AYUSH TV, TimesXP, NBT Lyf, Vistara Health, and Zee Kannada News, have reached millions, spreading awareness on holistic living and the power of Ayurveda. Awards and Recognition:1. Zee Kannada News Achiever's Awards 2025, Bengaluru2. Chanakya Awards - 2020 (Jury Special Awards for Healthcare through Ayurveda) by Public Relations Council of India, Bengaluru 3. One of the youngest Ayurveda Doctors, who was invited to speak on Ayurveda in LONDON, UK4. Author of Amazon Best Selling book titled 'The Blockbuster Health 1.0' which revolves around good eating habits. He has the credit of writing his second book in just 100 days post release of first book. Both the books are available on amazon.in5. Awarded with the title 'BEST YOUNG RESEARCHER AYURVEDA SURGERY (SHALYA TANTRA)' by RULA Awards in November 20186. Influential Invited Speaker on Healthcare throughout India. He is one of the top-rated Ayurveda Consultant digitally7. 'Ayurveda Vishwa Ratna' at 2nd World Ayurveda Summit, Dec 2025, BengaluruSpecializations: 1. Gut Health & Autoimmune Conditions: Expert care for digestive issues and autoimmune disorders.2. Male Wellness & Fertility: Holistic approaches to enhance male reproductive health and fertility.3. Proctology: Specialized treatment for Pilonidal Sinus, Anal Fistula, and Piles using Kshara/Ksharasutra therapies.4. Pain Management, Skin Conditions & Respiratory Wellness: Effective management of pain, skin issues, and respiratory problems.5. Detoxification & Bio Purification: Panchakarma-based detox programs for overall well-being.Vision 2030:''To be known as an unmatched Ayurveda, wellness healthcare provider globally, reaching all bits of individuals, healing millions of lives through integrated clinical practice, education, awareness and research'' More about Dr. Sharad Kulkarni:1. Founder of Jeevottama Health Ayurveda and Co-founder of Vajiandro Wellness LLP (Exclusive Male Wellness centre) at Bengaluru 2. Dedicated towards diagnosis, investigations, treatment and follow up3. Health related videos(recorded/live) and blogs on various digital platforms like FB, Insta and YouTube with millions of viewership4. Publication of Research articles/blogs online Aims:Driven by a vision to digitalize Ayurveda and Yoga for global wellness, Dr. Kulkarni is dedicated to building a healthier society through social awareness and medicine-less healing by promoting diet and lifestyle corrections. He aims to create a global network of integrated healthcare professionals to reach even the remotest corners of the world. Through his initiative, Jeevottama Charitable Trust, he also works toward helping the underprivileged maintain good health and stay free from suffering, ensuring that quality Ayurveda care is accessible to all.

column43: Dr.Giridhara.N.K completed his Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicines & Surgery from ALN Rao Memorial Ayurvedic Medical College, Koppa. After completing his BAMS he went to pursue the hidden treasures of Ayurveda in the heartlands of Kerala. He became the protÃ©gÃ© of Dr.Aryadevi, Chief Physician, Sukrutham Ayurvedic Hospital, Calicut, a direct disciple of Ashtavaidya Parampara, under whom he started visualizing the age old tradition of Ayurveda in a new light. To quench his interest in Bala chikitsa (Ayurvedic version of Paediatrics) Dr.Giridhar then joined CNS Bala Chikitsalayam under legendary Bala Chikitsa expert, Vaidya Gangadharan Nair. After finishing his training under these stalwarts, he returned to Bangalore as the branch physician of Vaidyaratnam Oushadhasala. Following the footprints of his Guru, Dr.Aryadevi, he started Sukrutham Ayurveda.Dr.Giridhar has a vision for Ayurveda, as a science, that walks with the changing needs of time. He reaches out to the masses through interviews in televisions and articles in newspapers. He has a mind committed to modern standards of quality, and is a expert ISO consultant.

column2: 74, Shop Number 2, Ground Floor, ITPL Main Road
column43: Dr. Manoj Kumar Samantaray graduate of B.A.M.S (Bachelor in Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery) from the Utkal University in India, one of the prestigious institutions in India offering Ayurvedic Degrees. After completing his B.A.M.S, he joined for Master degree (M.D) at S.D.M College of Ayurveda, Udupi, one of the Best Institute in India in its excellency for providing higher studies in Ayurveda, Under Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences, Bangalore India. In 2011, he completed a Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D.) from Utkal University. Vaidya Dr. Manoj Kumar Samantaray started his carrier in Sri Sri College of Ayurvedic Science and Research, Bangalore as an academician & consultant. He Works as associate Professor, Pharmacy in charge at the prestigious institute under the Art of Living organization. His active participant enables Sri Sri Ayurveda R&D to produce many new Ayurvedic formulations. Of late he was sent in deputation to Sri Sri Ayurveda, Bad Antogast, Germany in April 2016 till April 2017. He has been responsible for doing Pulse Diagnosis Consultations, recommending natural and healthy tips on Nutrition and Lifestyle. He has travelled across Germany conducting various Ayurveda trainings & programs. He is a member of Karnataka Ayurvedic Teacher's Association. He is...• Committed to medical profession with more than 16 years of extensive Diagnostic & Drug Preparation Skills.• Presenting papers on various emerging Ayurvedic Subjects in international seminars.• Sound expertise in training & mentoring on Ayurvedic Topics.• Expertise on ancient diagnostic such as “Nadi Pareeksha” & “Panchakarma”• Sole in charge of Sri Sri Ayurveda hospital pharmacy for over 10 years.• Participate in formulating more than 20 formulations of Sri Sri Ayurveda.• Active involvement in attending OPD & IPD in Sri Sri college of Ayurvedic Science & Research hospital since sept. 2006 till date• Successfully treated thousands of patients with specialized skin care treatments.• Technical Advisor of Sri Sri Ayurveda and many Ayurveda Pharmaceutical companies.• Recently had been deputed to Sri Sri Ayurveda Germany from April 2016 till March 2017 to carry out Research on new product development , suits to European Market.

column2: 10 , 1st Floor, Marathahalli Bridge
column43: Dr. M. B. Gayathri is an Ayurvedic Physician, has served in various Ayurveda and panchakarma centers and is currently working at Ayurvedism, Marathalli, Bangalore. She holds a Master degree in Ayurveda (M.D) from Government Ayurveda Medical College (GAMC) Bangalore. She has more than 32years of experience in Ayurveda treating patients in India, UK and USA. Her core expertise is in treating ophthalmic disorders. She also has expertise in treating chronic disorders like Osteoarthritis, Osteoporosis, Spondylosis, Skin disorders (Psoriasis, Eczema, Acne, warts, Herpes), Respiratory diseases, Renal disorders, Chronic Headaches like migraine. She is also specialized in treating chronic cases of Crohn's disease, ulcers, acidity and other digestive ailments. She is an expert in treating male and female infertility problems related disorders, PCOD, PCOS and other menstrual disorders. She has treated patient with stress related health issues. She is very successful in treating alopecia, baldness and hair fall.Her researches include “A Clinical study on Naktandyatha & its management with special reference to Shleshma Vidagda Drishti through Anjana Prayoga” and “A Clinical study on Refractive Errors – Myopia & its management with ocular exercises”. She has presented herself in various conferences and has done compilations on SURYA VARTHA and KSHUDRANTRA. She has also been a frequent speaker in international conferences and published articles on “Single drug therapy in netra roga from classical ayurvedic literature” and Kannu vaidyar: a living legend. She completed BAMS from Government College of Indian Medicine Bangalore in 1994 and MD-Ayurveda from Government College of Indian Medicine Bangalore in 1997.

column2: Kottakkal Arya Vaidaya Sala. Pranavam Ayurveda Treatment Center # 302, 3rd Floor, A - Block,(Above ICICI Bank)TNT Crescent,64/2, Thanisandra Main Road
column43: Dr. P Saritha Nair, a native of Trivandrum, completed her BAMS degree from Govt. Ayurveda College, Trivandrum in the year 1989. Acquired additional qualification like: DCS (Diploma in Counselling Skill) from Banjara Academy, Bangalore, BLS (Basic Life Support) & CTC (Cardiac Technology Course) from Bhagwan Mahaveer Jain Hospital, Bangalore. She has vast experience in Ayurvedic Medicne & Panchakarma Treatment and specialized in Marma Chikitsa. She is an expert yoga teacher also. She has worked in various capacities with various Ayurvedic Institutions like Kerala Ayurveda Pharmacy, Kottakal, Bidyanath, Nagarjuna Pharmacy, Vaidyarathnam Oushadhasala & Medimix Sanjeevanam for the past 28 years.She started her own Clinic in the year 2001 in HRBR Layout Kalyan Nagar, Bangalore. Her dedicated hard work paved way for setting up of her own Ayurvedic Hospital chain – Pranavam Ayurvdic Treatment Centre. In the year 2012 the first hospital of the chain was inaugurated by Sri. Jaikrishnan Nambi, Marketing Manager, Thaikattu Mooss SNA Oushadasala and Sri Ramachandran Paleri, Chairman Karnataka Nair Service Society at Jakkasandra Kormangala. After that there was no looking back for Dr. Saritha. She opened the second Hospital in2013 In Indiranagar, the third Hospital in 2014 in Trivandrum, and the fourth in 2015 in Nagawara. She has now Five Hospitals with Four of them in Bangalore, Karnataka and one in Trivandrum Kerala with in-patient facility for all chronic ailments. The hospital has the facility for all type of Panchakarma Treatment and Medicines. She was falicitated with the following awards:(1)Pranavam Ayurvedic Treatment Centre was awarded the India Health Care Award 2016 for The Best Ayurveda Hospital in Bangalore by Blindwink Solutions Pvt Ltd., (2)India’s Most Prominent Health Care Award – 2016 for the Best Ayurveda Hospital in Karnataka by Merit Awards & Market Research Pvt. Ltd., which was given by Honourable Minister for Science & Technology Dr Harsh Wardhan. (3)Dr P Saritha Nair was awarded the Best Doctor & Health Care Award - 2017 for The Best Ayurvedic Doctor in South India by Xel Research(4)India’s Most Prominent Health Care Award – 2018 for the Best Ayurvedic Treatment Provider in Karnataka by Merit Awards & Market Research Pvt. Ltd.,
