column43: Dr. Anuja Marawar has about 13 years of experience in Ayurvedic Panchakarma treatments and is a patient focused doctor. column43: Dr. N. Praveen Kumar was born in Bangalore India. After graduation, he completed his M. D General Medicine from Sri Devaraj URS Medical College Kolar, Karnataka, India in 2009. column43: Dr Harish’s main objective is to serve INDIA through medicine by making people healthy and excel in profession and serve towards humanity.Dr Harish is one of the expert in handling the deadly corona virus, has taken in-charge as chief intensivist and successfully treated more than 2000 critical corona patients and innumerable ward cases.He is excelled in early recognition and management of diabetes. His specialty includes managing all complication of diabetes including diabetic foot, neuropathy, end organ damage like nephropathy. He has also expertise in management of various infectious diseases and Cardiology, Hepatology, Hematology, Nephrology and Neurology diseases.Dr Harish N S completed his MBBS from JJM Medical College, Davanagere. MD (General Medicine) from Shri B M Patil Medical College, Bijapur. He has done fellowship in diabetes in collaboration with Royal Liverpool Academy, UK. His passion towards humanity persued him to do his Indian Diploma in Critical Care Medicine (fellowship in critical care) from Narayana Hrudayalaya Bangalore recognised by Indian Society of Critical Care Medicine.He started his carrier as Senior Registrar in General Medicine Department at Sahyadri Narayana Hrudayala, Shimoga. Did his fellowship in Diabetes recognised by Royal Liverpool UK. He continued his carrier in ICU at Columbia Asia Hospital Whitefield, Bangalore. Later, he did his fellowship in critical care at Narayana Health’s Muzumdhar Shaw Medical Center, Bangalore. Also worked as Consultant Intensivist at Ramiah Memorial Hospital, Bangalore. Currently working as Lead Consultant Physician and Intensivist in Sparsh Hospitals, Bangalore.Dr Harish N S trains IDCCM candidates and involved in training postgraduate students in critical care. He has given number of talks on management of various conditions in ICU at state and National levels. Dr Harish N S is a part of training Government doctors in ICU (a Governament of Karnataka Project). Honoured with COVID warrior award in the year 2021 by IMA.

column43: Dr. N. Praveen Kumar was born in Bangalore India. After graduation, he completed his M. D General Medicine from Sri Devaraj URS Medical College Kolar, Karnataka, India in 2009. Post Graduation he started working as a consultant cardiologist in BMJH. Presently he is the assistant professor at Sridevi Medical College Tumkur. He started Samiksha Heart And Diabetic Care in the year 2013 to provide cardiac services in Yelahanka, Bangalore.Presently he is the visiting cardiologist for all the major hospitals in and around Yelahanka. Dr. Praveen has a clinical interest in preventive cardiology, lipid disorders, and cardiac imaging. He is known for the diagnosis of both common and rare, complex cardiac disorders. His goal is to maintain the old-fashioned physician/patient relationship while applying the most advanced technology for diagnosis and treatment of cardiac and diabetic disorders.

column43: Dr Harish’s main objective is to serve INDIA through medicine by making people healthy and excel in profession and serve towards humanity.Dr Harish is one of the expert in handling the deadly corona virus, has taken in-charge as chief intensivist and successfully treated more than 2000 critical corona patients and innumerable ward cases.He is excelled in early recognition and management of diabetes. His specialty includes managing all complication of diabetes including diabetic foot, neuropathy, end organ damage like nephropathy. He has also expertise in management of various infectious diseases and Cardiology, Hepatology, Hematology, Nephrology and Neurology diseases.Dr Harish N S completed his MBBS from JJM Medical College, Davanagere. MD (General Medicine) from Shri B M Patil Medical College, Bijapur. He has done fellowship in diabetes in collaboration with Royal Liverpool Academy, UK. His passion towards humanity persued him to do his Indian Diploma in Critical Care Medicine (fellowship in critical care) from Narayana Hrudayalaya Bangalore recognised by Indian Society of Critical Care Medicine.He started his carrier as Senior Registrar in General Medicine Department at Sahyadri Narayana Hrudayala, Shimoga. Did his fellowship in Diabetes recognised by Royal Liverpool UK. He continued his carrier in ICU at Columbia Asia Hospital Whitefield, Bangalore. Later, he did his fellowship in critical care at Narayana Health’s Muzumdhar Shaw Medical Center, Bangalore. Also worked as Consultant Intensivist at Ramiah Memorial Hospital, Bangalore. Currently working as Lead Consultant Physician and Intensivist in Sparsh Hospitals, Bangalore.Dr Harish N S trains IDCCM candidates and involved in training postgraduate students in critical care. He has given number of talks on management of various conditions in ICU at state and National levels. Dr Harish N S is a part of training Government doctors in ICU (a Governament of Karnataka Project). Honoured with COVID warrior award in the year 2021 by IMA.

column43: "Dr Amarnath A is a Consultant Medical Gastroenterologist, Bangalore Gastro Centre, HSR layout, Bengaluru. His approach prioritizes patient comfort, using minimally invasive procedures designed to reduce pain, accelerate recovery, and minimize hospital stay. column43: I completed undergraduate training from JJMMC Davangere in 2000, completed MRCP (UK) in 2009 and did specialist training in Diabetes and Endocrinology at University Hospital, Cambridge and University Hospitals Leicester in the UK. I have completed a postgraduate Diploma in Diabetes and Endocrinology from Queen Mary University London in 2012. I have experience in treating patients with Type 1 and Type 2 Diabetes, Diabetic emergencies, and complications. I have done specialist courses on day to day management of both Type 1 and Type 2 Diabetes, communication and counselling skills, patient education and empowerment, and use of technology in treating diabetes- Insulin pump course. I have had experience in managing diabetes and endocrine conditions in special circumstances like pregnancy, elderly, and special needs patients and dealing with various complications of diabetes. With regards to endocrine disorders, I have had experience in treating patients with thyroid, parathyroid, adrenal, PCOS, pancreatic and pituitary disorders. I have given expert talks, in national and international conferences related to diabetes and endocrine disorders. I have authored chapters in textbooks regarding both diabetes and endocrine disorders. I belive in educating and empowering my patients with knowledge about their condition and also how they can help themselves on a day to day basis. I am a hard working person who knows my strengths and limitations, which I feel is very important in treating patients.

column6: Pain Management Specialist, General Physician, Hospice and Palliative Medicine Specialist
column43: Dr. Raghavendra Ramanjulu is a highly acclaimed Pain and Palliative Physician working as the Lead Consultant Palliative Medicine & Rehabilitation services at Aster CMI Hospital. His areas of special interest are Complex Interactable Symptom Management, Interdisciplinary Pain management, Interventional Pain Management, Palliative Rehabilitation, End of Life care, Extended care at home.He did his MBBS from Dr.B R Ambedkar Medical College, Bangalore, followed by M.D training in Anaesthesia from Shree Siddhartha Medical College, Tumkur, Karnataka in 2006. After completing his senior residency at the Department of Neuroanaesthesia from NIMHANS started his carrier as an Anaesthesiologist with a special interest in pain management for a period of 4 years, during which he pursued various chronic pain and palliative care training at the 3 national including the ISSP sponsored fellowship at Sir Gangaram Hospital, New Delhi and the Indian Association of palliative care certification Part 1 &2. The interest to further enhance his knowledge and to pursue pain and palliation as his full-time career he completed his Fellowship training in Chronic Pain management from Postgraduate Medical Institute, Singapore General Hospital, Singapore. He was certified as a fellow in interventional pain management from the World Institute of Pain, USA. He late completed his Diploma in Palliative medicine and then graduated with MSc in Palliative Medicine from Cardiff University, Cardiff, UK. He has been a part of several research projects on brain tumors as well.An ever enthusiastic professional, he has participated in various programs, attended a number of national and international conferences, and has several publications to his credit. He has conducted several hands-on workshops and has trained several pain and palliative care physicians from across the country.

column6: Pain Management Specialist, General Physician, Hospice and Palliative Medicine Specialist
column43: Dr. Raghavendra Ramanjulu is a highly acclaimed Pain and Palliative Physician working as the Lead Consultant Palliative Medicine & Rehabilitation services at Aster CMI Hospital. His areas of special interest are Complex Interactable Symptom Management, Interdisciplinary Pain management, Interventional Pain Management, Palliative Rehabilitation, End of Life care, Extended care at home.He did his MBBS from Dr.B R Ambedkar Medical College, Bangalore, followed by M.D training in Anaesthesia from Shree Siddhartha Medical College, Tumkur, Karnataka in 2006. After completing his senior residency at the Department of Neuroanaesthesia from NIMHANS started his carrier as an Anaesthesiologist with a special interest in pain management for a period of 4 years, during which he pursued various chronic pain and palliative care training at the 3 national including the ISSP sponsored fellowship at Sir Gangaram Hospital, New Delhi and the Indian Association of palliative care certification Part 1 &2. The interest to further enhance his knowledge and to pursue pain and palliation as his full-time career he completed his Fellowship training in Chronic Pain management from Postgraduate Medical Institute, Singapore General Hospital, Singapore. He was certified as a fellow in interventional pain management from the World Institute of Pain, USA. He late completed his Diploma in Palliative medicine and then graduated with MSc in Palliative Medicine from Cardiff University, Cardiff, UK. He has been a part of several research projects on brain tumors as well.An ever enthusiastic professional, he has participated in various programs, attended a number of national and international conferences, and has several publications to his credit. He has conducted several hands-on workshops and has trained several pain and palliative care physicians from across the country.

column43: Dr.Rakshay Shetty is the lead Pediatric Intensivist in Rainbow Children’s Hospital. He shares the responsibility of patient care and training with the Pediatric intensive care and Emergency medicine team. He completed his training in Pediatrics from PGIMER, Chandigarh. Post residency, he worked as a senior resident in Pediatric Intensive Care at the same institute before moving to the prestigious Hospital for Sick Children, Toronto to complete his Fellowship Program in Intensive Care. Dr.Rakshay Shetty is a founder member of Indian Pediatric Simulation society, PediSTARS and has been instrumental in spreading simulation-based training through conferences and workshops throughout the country. He has represented India globally in the field of simulation-based education and was an invited visiting professor at Children’s Hospital of Philadelphia. In addition to his enthusiasm in Simulation, he has a keen interest in the field of point of care ultrasound, cardiopulmonary interactions and Neurointensive care. He is currently an Associate editor for Journal of Pediatric Critical care. He has also contributed to the book chapters related to the practice of Pediatric critical care medicine and has a few international research publications to his credit. As a member of IAP, Indian Society of Critical care Medicine and IAP intensive care chapter, he has delivered many lectures and conducted workshops nationally. He also volunteered as a Pediatric Cardiac Intensivist for the camps held by Mending Kids International (MKI) and International Child Heart foundation (ICHF) for their missions in Africa.Areas of expertise • Family oriented ICU care for Sick babies• Emergency Care for Sick Children• Medical Simulation• Quality and SafetyExperience• Head, Pediatric Emergency and intensive care services• More than 15 years of experience• Trained at best centres in the world• Founded society for Medical Simulation- PediSTARS• Authored and edited many textbooks in Pediatric Intensive Care• Research Publications in leading scientific journals• Invited speaker in various national and International platforms• Voted as one of the Top 20 Pediatricians in the country

column43: Dr. Swati Hegde is a highly accomplished General Physician currently practicing at Kashyap Multispeciality Clinic, located in Rajaji Nagar, Bangalore. With a steadfast commitment to delivering exceptional medical care, Dr. Hegde has established herself as a trusted healthcare provider, known for her comprehensive approach to the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of a broad spectrum of medical conditions.Throughout her career, Dr. Hegde has demonstrated profound expertise in managing both acute illnesses and chronic diseases across diverse patient populations. Her clinical acumen encompasses the effective treatment of common infectious diseases, respiratory ailments, gastrointestinal disorders, and lifestyle-related conditions such as diabetes mellitus, hypertension, and asthma. She places significant emphasis on early detection and proactive management, recognizing the critical role of preventive healthcare in reducing disease burden and enhancing patient outcomes.Dr. Swati Hegde’s medical philosophy centers around patient-centric care, wherein individualized treatment plans are developed after careful consideration of each patient’s unique medical history, social circumstances, and personal preferences. She advocates for clear and transparent communication, ensuring that patients are well-informed and actively engaged in their healthcare decisions. This collaborative approach not only fosters trust but also empowers patients to take charge of their health and well-being.Widely respected by her peers and deeply appreciated by her patients, Dr. Hegde is known for her compassionate demeanor, meticulous attention to detail, and unwavering dedication to improving the lives of those under her care. Her approachable nature and genuine empathy enable her to build strong, lasting relationships with her patients, making her a preferred choice for comprehensive and compassionate medical care.In addition to her clinical expertise, Dr. Hegde is dedicated to continuous professional development and remains abreast of the latest advancements in general medicine. By integrating evidence-based practices with compassionate care, she strives to offer treatment that is both scientifically sound and empathetic. Her ability to combine medical proficiency with genuine concern creates a supportive and reassuring environment that encourages open dialogue and holistic healing.At Kashyap Multispeciality Clinic, Dr. Swati Hegde plays a vital role in addressing the healthcare needs of the community in Bangalore. Her commitment to excellence, coupled with her holistic approach, enables her to provide comprehensive healthcare services that improve the overall quality of life for her patients. Whether managing complex chronic illnesses or providing routine health evaluations, Dr. Hegde’s dedication to her patients’ health is unwavering.In summary, Dr. Swati Hegde embodies the principles of thorough clinical evaluation, personalized care, and continuous learning. Her practice reflects a balanced integration of advanced medical knowledge and compassionate patient engagement, making her a respected and valued medical professional within the healthcare community.
